author: ryan musick
comment: This was my favorite watch face for my moto 360 2nd gen (5 stars).  Now that the weather will not load, it looses a great deal of its functionality.                                                  Update:  watch face is now fully functional.  Weather and  sunrise / sunset  are now displayed.  Developer responded very quickly  and resolved the issue in less than 2 days.  5 stars.
